text: Gianni Clerici (24 July 1930 – 6 June 2022) was an Italian tennis commentator, journalist, and tennis player. Clerici was born in Como, Italy. He was known for commenting on the Wimbledon Championships. He was honored into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in 2006. Clerici died on 6 June 2022, aged 91.È morto Gianni Clerici, scrittore giornalista e storica firma di Repubblica del tennis ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Political commentators Category:Male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Como
title: Gianni Clerici
